definitions.text: give an exhibition of to an interested audience
examples: We will demo the new software in Washington

definitions.text: establish the validity of something, as by an example, explanation or experiment
examples: The experiment demonstrated the instability of the compound
The mathematician showed the validity of the conjecture

definitions.text: provide evidence for; stand as proof of; show by one's behavior, attitude, or external attributes
examples: His high fever attested to his illness
The buildings in Rome manifest a high level of architectural sophistication
This decision demonstrates his sense of fairness

definitions.text: march in protest; take part in a demonstration
examples: Thousands demonstrated against globalization during the meeting of the most powerful economic nations in Seattle
